metadata.name: The Mist
metadata.description:
Photo taken during filming related to the life of the farmers who migrated to the forest in the Eastern Western Ghats and the lives of the farmers who fight against the attacks of animals and find daily work.  
An attempt has been made to bring this photograph to life with a simple animation.

Photo Location : Nilambur, Kerala, India  
Camera : Nikon D800 + 70-200 mm f/2.8mm Lens.  
Used Software :  Photoshop, Premier, After Effects.  
Date / Year : December  2022

Artists Profile:  
-------------------  
I’m a Photographer, Cartoonist, Illustrator and Digital artist.  
Published lots of Cartoons, Illustrations and photographs are various publications and Honored with MERIT MEDAL AWARD from HIPA International photography contest 2017-2018 seasons.  
Now full time in NFT Photography – Digital Art.

Manifold ERC 1155 smart contract :  
---------------------------------------------  
With the purchase of this NFT, the artist grants the primary holder the license to sell, trade, or transfer the NFT on the blockchain. The NFT may be shown privately, in commercial and non-commercial venues, and in groups with an unlimited number of members. The license allows for unrestricted use and display in virtual and real galleries, essays, and films. The holder of this non-exclusive license may also share on social media platforms with proper attribution. The primary holder is prohibited from making "commercial use" of the underlying works, which includes commercial products, commercial distribution, and derivative works. The artist retains ownership of the underlying work's copyright, intellectual property rights, and reproduction rights. The artist also reserves the right to reuse the entire image or portions of it to make additional artworks, as well as to create an animated NFT of this artwork.
